body_html:
I read the source code then figure it out how tf.train.MonitoredTrainingSession works.
The key point is you should use a new empty checkpoint directory, otherwise the 'init_op' or other ops won't work.
The complete answer is here:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48017748/in-tensorflow-when-graph-is-modified-how-to-use-monitoredtrainingsession-to-r/48071975#48071975

body:
I read the source code then figure it out how tf.train.MonitoredTrainingSession works.
The key point is you should use a new empty checkpoint directory, otherwise the 'init_op' or other ops won't work.
The complete answer is here:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48017748/in-tensorflow-when-graph-is-modified-how-to-use-monitoredtrainingsession-to-r/48071975#48071975
